headline: CME Outage Tests Trading Reliability As Valuation Premium Faces Fresh Scrutiny
summary: CME Group experienced a significant outage on its CME Globex platform that triggered a full trading halt in metals and natural gas futures and options. The disruption occurred during a critical contract expiry window, affecting gold, copper and natural gas markets. Traders were unable to roll positions and saw existing orders cancelled, raising fresh questions about the reliability of CME’s core trading infrastructure. CME Group (NasdaqGS:CME) sits at the center of global derivatives...
